document_data.name: Chaos Shield
document_data.mainbody: '''''Chaos shield''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[wild mage]]s.
document_data.Effects: A wild mage used this spell to protect themself during a [[Wild surge|surge of magical energy]]. The spell did not protect the caster from a wild surge caused by another caster's spell. The spell did not differentiate between negative or positive effects of a wild surge, the caster was protected from both. The spell only protected the caster, anyone in their vicinity was still at risk. It was often cast after the ''[[Nahal's reckless dweomer]]'' spell.{{Cite document/Baldur's Gate II: Throne of Bhaal Game Manual|17}}
document_data.Components: The spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
